description:
Andrew Hanbridge is the son of http://anidb.net/ch90104 [Earl Paul Hanbridge] and is childhood friends with http://anidb.net/ch52148 [Diana]. Having grown up in a rich family, Andrew has an old-fashioned prejudice against witches, which gradually starts to change after he meets http://anidb.net/ch52146 [Akko].
Source: Wikipedia
name: Andrew Hanbridge
